trans-unit.source: Wrong password! Backup your Recovery Key as soon as possible!
trans-unit.target: كلمة المرور خاطئة، قم باستخراج والاحتفاظ بفتاح الاسترجاع خاصتك بأسرع ما يمكن
trans-unit.note: Warning message displayed when the password test fails.

trans-unit.source: Test Password
trans-unit.note: Title of the test password dialog.

trans-unit.source: The Recovery Key has been exported. Please store it in a safe place.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog or notification displayed in cases that the app has succesful exported the recovery key.

trans-unit.source: Recovery Key exported
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog or notification displayed in cases that the app has succesful exported the recovery key.

trans-unit.source: Failed to export the Recovery Key. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: فشل تصدير مفتاح الاسترجاع. يرجى إعادة المحاولة
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog or notification displayed in cases that the app has not succesful exported the recovery key.

trans-unit.source: Recovery Key export failed
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog or notification displayed in cases that the app has not succesful exported the recovery key.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to close all other sessions? This will log you out on all other active sessions except the current one.
trans-unit.target: هل تريد انهاء كل الجلسات الفعالة حاليا؟ ذلك سيسجل الخروج من كل هذه الجلسات الفعالة باستثناء الحالية
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed to ask the user to confirm want to close all the other sessions.

trans-unit.source: Two-factor authentication is a second layer of security for your account. Which means that even if someone knows your password they cannot access it, without also having access to the six digit code only you have access to.
trans-unit.target: Two-factor authentication is a second layer of security for your account. Which means that even if someone knows your password they cannot access it, without also having access to the six digit code only you have access to.
trans-unit.note: Description text of the dialog displayed to start setup the Two-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: Why do you need two-factor authentication?
trans-unit.target: Why do you need two-factor authentication?
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed to start setup the Two-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: This code isn’t right, please try again.
trans-unit.target: This code isn’t right, please try again.
trans-unit.note: Message displayed when the user is trying to insert and invalid code, for example the 6-digit code of the Multi-Factor Authentication.

trans-unit.source: Next time you login to your account you will be asked to enter a 6-digit code provided by your Authenticator app.
trans-unit.target: Next time you login to your account you will be asked to enter a 6-digit code provided by your Authenticator app.
trans-unit.note: Description text of the dialog displayed to indicate that the user has successfully enabled the Two-Factor Authentication.

trans-unit.source: Two-Factor Authentication Enabled
trans-unit.note: Title text of the dialog displayed to indicate that the user has successfully enabled the Two-Factor Authentication.

trans-unit.source: The seed has been copied to your clipboard.
trans-unit.target: The seed has been copied to your clipboard.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the seed needed to enable the Multi-Factor Authentication has been copied successfully to the clipboard.

trans-unit.source: Failed to copy the seed to your clipboard. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Failed to copy the seed to your clipboard. Please try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed if fails the process to copy the seed needed to enable the Multi-Factor Authentication to the clipboard.

trans-unit.source: Seed copy failed
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed if fails the process to copy the seed needed to enable the Multi-Factor Authentication to the clipboard.

trans-unit.source: Seed copied
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the seed needed to enable the Multi-Factor Authentication has been copied successfully to the clipboard.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the code generated by your authentication app
trans-unit.target: Please enter the code generated by your authentication app
trans-unit.note: Description text of the dialog displayed to introduce the 6-digit code for the MFA.

trans-unit.source: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed to disable the Two-Factor Authentication.

trans-unit.source: If you lose access to your account after enabling 2FA and you have not backed up your Recovery Key, MEGA can’t help you gain access to it again. Ensure you back up your recovery key.
trans-unit.target: If you lose access to your account after enabling 2FA and you have not backed up your Recovery Key, MEGA can’t help you gain access to it again. Ensure you back up your recovery key.
trans-unit.note: Text recommending export the Recovery Key in the dialog displayed to indicate that the user has successfully enabled the Two-Factor Authentication. KEEP the multi-line format.

trans-unit.source: Two-Factor Authentication Disabled
trans-unit.note: Title text of the dialog displayed to indicate that the user has successfully disabled the Two-Factor Authentication.

trans-unit.source: Failed to restore ‘{0}’ from rubbish bin. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Failed to restore ‘{0}’ from rubbish bin. Please try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to restore a node to the rubbish bin failed. Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include the file/folder name in runtime.

trans-unit.source: Restore from rubbish bin failed
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to restore nodes from the rubbish bin failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to restore items from rubbish bin. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Failed to restore items from rubbish bin. Please try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to restore multiple nodes from the rubbish bin failed.

trans-unit.source: Failed to check the Multi-Factor Authentication status.
